items.title: Government hackers are leading the use of attributed zero-days, Google says
items.description: Governments like China and North Korea, along with spyware makers, used the most recorded zero-days in 2024.

items.title: As Measles Cases Surge, Mexico Issues a US Travel Alert
items.description: The border state of Chihuahua has recorded 713 confirmed cases, with its outbreak linked to the ongoing cluster of cases north of the border in Texas.
